Two of the largest wind farms in the United States are located here : the Alta Wind Engergy Center , which as of 2013 was the largest wind farm in the United States , and the Tehachapi Pass Wind Farm , which in 2013 was the fifth largest wind farm .
There are lots of excellent trails and parks for outdoor activities .

The
Pacific Crest Trail
passes through Tehachapi along highway 58 .

An out-of-the-city , out-of-the-ordinary , quiet , friendly timeshare environment offering one and two bedroom luxury cottages with swimming and seasonal tennis and golf nearby .

- Nicknamed " the country music capital of the West Coast " , Bakersfield is the largest city in the southern
San Joaquin Valley
and is thus the best option for those seeking lodging , transportation , or other services .
- Located west on Highway 58 , Keene is home to the Cesar E. Chavez National Monument , which contains the headquarters and grave site of the famous labor leader .

Another attraction is the Tehachapi Loop , which is located just outside of town and is a favorite of railroad fans around the world since the engineering wonder is one of the few places where a train can be seen passing over itself .

- East of Tehachapi on Highway 58 , Mojave is a hotbed of aerospace activity , with the Mojave Spaceport the headquarters of Scaled Composites , the first private company to launch a human into space .
Edwards Air Force base , a landing site for the space shuttle and a center for the development of experimental aircraft , is located adjacent to the town .
